Title: Relates to differential response programs for child protection assessments or investigations
Summary: Relates to differential response programs for child protection assessments or investigations; requires social services districts to establish such programs upon authorization from the office of children and family services.
LawCode: Amd ยง427-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to differential response programs for child protection assessments or investigations
